measure_drawable

protected void measure_drawable(java.awt.FontMetrics fm)
Performs the word wrap functionality for this class. Breaks lines up to form new lines when the line is too long for the given space.
Parameters:
fm - the metrics of the font being used
Since:
ADK 6.1

fitString

protected java.lang.String fitString(java.lang.String text,
                                     java.awt.FontMetrics fm,
                                     int width)
Given a string, returns the string or a part of it that will fit within the given width. The break will be by word only (word wrap).
Parameters:
text - the string to fit into the given width
fm - the metrics of the font being used
width - the max size the drawn string can be
Returns:
a string that fits in the width given
Since:
ADK 6.1
